# Offset Views

[![GitHub](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?label=github&message=FedericoStra/offset-views&color=brightgreen&logo=github)](https://github.com/FedericoStra/offset-views)
[![Crates.io](https://img.shields.io/crates/v/offset-views?logo=rust)](https://crates.io/crates/offset-views)
[![docs.rs](https://img.shields.io/docsrs/offset-views?logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)](https://docs.rs/offset-views)
[![MIT license](https://img.shields.io/crates/l/offset-views)](https://github.com/FedericoStra/offset-views/blob/master/LICENSE)
[![GitHub Workflow Status](https://img.shields.io/github/actions/workflow/status/FedericoStra/offset-views/rust.yml?logo=githubactions&logoColor=white)](https://github.com/FedericoStra/offset-views/actions/workflows/rust.yml)
![Lines of code](https://tokei.rs/b1/github/FedericoStra/offset-views?category=code)

Create and index offset views of arrays, slices, strings, etc.

- Repository: https://github.com/FedericoStra/offset-views
